Contact Me Experience Skills

I'm keeping a blog as motivation to research and demo an aspect of HTML, CSS or JavaScript that I haven't tried before or want to explore more in-depth.

This is a great way to learn and add more tricks to my developer bag. I hope you find something useful here too. :)

carolyncodes.com

CarolynCodes.com is created, written and maintained by Carolyn Velez. It is built using static generator Jekyll and responsive boilerplate Skeleton. And of course HTML, CSS3 and Sass. Branding by Joy Rubin Creative.
